includedAssets.title: Gossip
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael feels guilty after he spreads damaging gossip. To cover his tracks, he attempts to discredit himself by spreading obvious lies.

includedAssets.title: The Meeting
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael's intervention damages Jim's chances of a promotion, while Dwight and Toby investigate Darryl's work-related injury.

includedAssets.title: Niagara
includedAssets.synopsis: The team travel to Niagara for Pam and Jim's wedding, where Michael and Dwight hit on other guests and Andy sustains a painful injury.
